"Who is the one who presses the button in the country?
He replied with a verse.
'The towering, ten-thousand-foot mountain is Cao Shan.
His bearing is so lofty that he sits at the barrier of the patriarchs.
He pushes his diagonal seeker across the bowels and completely corrects his order.
The world is peaceful, and he cuts through foolishness.
(Foshentai).

source_sentence: 禪宗頌古聯珠通集卷第二十九
translation: Chanzong chanson lianzhu tongji, vol. 29
